subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXNPWLOX
WWUS76 KLOX 122110
NPWLOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
210 PM PDT THU APR 12 2007

CAZ053-054-130315-
/O.CON.KLOX.HW.W.0008.000000T0000Z-070413T0500Z/
VENTURA COUNTY MOUNTAINS-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY MOUNTAINS EXCLUDING THE SANTA MONICA RANGE-
210 PM PDT THU APR 12 2007

..HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS
EVENING...

A HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS 35 TO 45 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 60 MPH WILL
PREVAIL THROUGH THE EVENING.

MOTORISTS...ESPECIALLY OPERATORS OF HIGH PROFILE VEHICLES...ARE
URGED TO USE CAUTION WHILE TRAVELING THROUGH MOUNTAIN PASSES. BE
PREPARED FOR SUDDEN GUSTY CROSS WINDS WHICH CAN CAUSE YOUR VEHICLE
TO LOSE CONTROL. THE STRONGEST WINDS WILL OCCUR ALONG THE INTERSTATE
5 CORRIDOR...MAKING TRAVEL POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS.

$$

210 PM PDT THU APR 12 2007

EVENING...

A HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

WEST WINDS 35 TO 45 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 60 MPH WILL PREVAIL THROUGH
EARLY EVENING. BLOWING DUST AND SAND WILL WILL LIKELY REDUCE
VISIBILITIES AT TIMES.

$$

ADVISORY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 35 MPH WILL PREVAIL
THROUGH THE EVENING.

$$
